title: HNNNNNNNNNNNNNNG I GOT VOIDTALON
body:
http://puu.sh/lRtdP/ee9da2925e.jpg

http://puu.sh/lRt2L/8badf9f8ec.jpg

There's like 30 different spawnpoints for this mount spread out across the entire continent.

The portal into the area has a 13 hour respawn and only lasts 5 minutes, I've been casually hunting for it ever since it came out, I just never expected to get it so soon.
